text: RMN can mean: * Radio Mindanao Network * Reconciling Ministries Network, a Christian organisation * Registered Mental Nurse, a nursing credential in the UK * Réunion des Musées Nationaux, a French cultural umbrella organisation * Richard Milhous Nixon (1913–1994), 37th president of the United States * Robotic Magnetic Navigation * Royal Malaysian Navy * IATA code for Stafford Regional Airport
title: RMN
